name: Outrun Chase
description:
Outrun Chase is an Outrun/Retrowave themed racing/shooting game made in the Godot game engine that provides two game modes for the players to compete in, racing and deathmatch. The controls remain the same for both, but the objective and powers of the players change.

Features
  • Intuitive and easy to learn controls 🕹️
  • Local and online multiplayer
  • Two Game modes - Death Race and Death Match
  • Three maps - Vanilla Circuit, Contemporary art and Fire Lily
The Team

Outrun Chase was developed by SDSLabs. SDSLabs is a non-profit open source organization run by students of Indian Institute of Technology Roorkee. We are a group of passionate designers and developers who love to innovate and learn daily.

Contact Us

Come have a word with us at chat.sdslabs.co or join our Discord.
